name: Puppet and Dark Deception
description:
!WARNING! I AM NOT MAIN DEVELOPER AND EVEN HELPER OF THIS GAME. I JUST VOICED THE MAIN CHARACTER BUT MAIN DEVELOPER WRITTEN IN TITLE THAT'S HE, SO I AM NOT SASHUS CORPORATIONS AND JUST REUPLOAD THIS GAME.

Puppet and Dark Deception is an game, in that you need to collect crystals and find some secrets. The main player is Yomchi Naminov which 14 y.o. And also fan game of Dark Deception.

This game has been closed also 10/22/21 due to problems with optimization and main developer decided it's cringe. It was created in 04/02/2021
